privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.text1: We collect some basic information about you when you use our site.  Please review our privacy policy, and reach out if you have any questions or concerns.

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service
termsOfService.text1: This service is provided for free, and we kindly ask you set your expectations accordingly.  Please review our terms of service for further details.
termsOfService.text2: You should be at least 16 years of age when accessing this website.
